storyInfo: The Doctor and Mechanist go into the alley to investigate Muelsyse's disappearance, only to find themselves ambushed. Outside the city, the Pioneers seek to bargain hostages for their freedom. They fail.

attributes.content: 3:56 P.M. \ Overcast
Main District of Trimounts
This is the third time you've paged through Ptilopsis's personal log, Doctor.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Any new discoveries?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Ptilopsis keeps some detail-rich records.;Pioneer Team leader had a good education.;Elena's coffee ought to be pretty good.

attributes.content: Ptilopsis has a kind of special chip implanted in her brain.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 'Device #9'—Mayer calls it. Guessing that's Rhine Lab's internal codename for that tech.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's plugged up there directly into her nervous system. Functions as a regular part of her mind, and logs data on neural activity in each region and lobe all the while.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Which means you've just been looking at every last thing Ptilopsis's visual processors—her own two eyes—have been seeing.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Columbia's Pioneer Team members come from all backgrounds.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Youth dissatisfied with their lives, middle-aged couples drowning in debt, petty criminals who don't want to end up behind bars—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: And of course, Infected powerless to cough up exorbitant insurance, who don't resign themselves to being shut away in quarantine zones for 'treatment.'
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'm more interested in the agrypnotic Franks has been using, personally.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I love a drink after work as much as the next, but all that fluid intake on the job's bound to cut up your train of thought.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: From the logs Ptilopsis keeps synchronized with us, we can tell that along with her, there's our other Rhodes Island-partnered operator, Elena in Rhine Lab's Energy Section...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Along with Rhine Lab Originium Art Section's Director, Dorothy Franks. That's everyone caught up in this abduction by the Pioneers.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: And practically simultaneously, Saria informed us Rhine Lab Ecological Section's Director Muelsyse went missing after she sent out an SOS, and there's no telling if she's currently alive or dead.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Think there's an issue at Rhine Lab?;......;Are research jobs seriously this high-risk?

attributes.content: At present, looks like it.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Welcome to Columbia.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Sky-high odds Rhine Lab is already in crisis, if things are pushing Saria to ask Rhodes Island for help.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Lucky the landship's nearby, or else we'd be hard-pressed to make an expeditious response.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The kidnapping's gone down at a new site about a hundred or so klicks out from Trimounts, but Kal'tsit's concerned this has something to do with the experiments that got shut down a while back.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: What do they do at that site?;Originium mutation experimentation...;Tell me some more about Trimounts.

attributes.content: The stuff they show to outsiders indicates it's your typical testing grounds, currently in the middle of construction.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Kal'tsit's cleared us to access all relevant files before we enter Trimounts.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The city's the beating heart of Columbian science and technology. Hundreds of tech companies are headquartered in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The 'Diαbolic Crisis,' 'Loken Watertank,' the 'Lumberyard.'
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Each name means something to one of our Rhodes Island operators, and behind their fronts, ties to hundreds of similar experiments.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Most of these experiments have involved Originium's mutative effects on living beings' cells, and each one has been incredibly dangerous.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: In Columbia, more often than not, tech giants like Rhine Lab aren't going to participate directly in such high-risk experiments.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: They'll have smaller-scale organizations carry them out on their behalf, hire a Pioneer Team, construct a suitable site out in the wasteland fringes of the city to execute their experimental work.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: In this case, Ptilopsis is at Site 359, which is one of those.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: I remember your previous work experience...;Have you done work at similar sites before?

attributes.content: Work? I'm not gracing my time there with the word 'work.'
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Those megacorps 'plagiarized' what I created, and applied it all in places it wasn't meant to be.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: See that billboard, about fifty meters out? 'Volvort Kochinski's Automatic Popcorn-a-Tron for the home—faster, sweeter, every time.'
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I still have the prototype sketch for its energy core on my terminal.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It was supposed to be used in automatic wasteland road-cleaners at first, but my manager decided it'd never sell as a product.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: He says, what kind of HR company's spending on better equipment for Pioneers?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Brought my mind to Rhodes Island after that. Our course-clearer team in Engineering's using the very latest model.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I've long seen it coming. Be it Volvort Kochinski or Rhine Lab, in the end, all these so-called tech firms are going to be destroyed by their own creations—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Because they've never respected the creations themselves.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: What if Muelsyse got killed by her very own experiments?;It's not some horrific test subject holding Ptilopsis hostage, right?!

attributes.content: Was that a laugh line, Doctor?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Because what you said isn't sci-fi flick material, or a dumb joke.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Chances are it's tomorrow's news.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Now I get why Closure admires AND fears you...;......;No wonder you and Logos make a good team.

attributes.content: You mean her occasional stints as target practice for my new weapons?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: She can stop interrupting my work with her ridiculous ideas, and then she won't need to fear me.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: As a partner, Logos is pretty good.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But can you give him a reminder, Doctor?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: If he could cut some of his speechcraft, mission times would go down by at least 30%, and I could spend more time on my actual job.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Done processing the intel, Doctor.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: This is as much useful info as we have for now. I've already set the most important files to top priority on lookup. You can read them via PRTS at any time.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Ptilopsis's logs haven't been updated past this point.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Device #9's data transmission should be more stable ever since Mayer adjusted it.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: So unless something physically happened to Ptilopsis...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: I'm getting concerned for her.;Fingers crossed Silence and Greyy find her ASAP.

attributes.content: Silence will notify us of any developments at the site as they happen.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Saria's copied the info. She'll be rendezvousing with us in an hour.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, any other proposals for the time we have left?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Go to where Muelsyse hit trouble, take a look.

attributes.content: I'm a mechanist. I'm no detective's assistant.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: But it's all we can do right now.;And I'm just an Originium researcher.
You're the only one I can count on, Mechanist.

attributes.content: Alright, Doctor. In that case, we move now.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Here's hoping I'm back on the landship by tomorrow, at my beloved workbench.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 6:47 P.M. \ Overcast
Test Site 359 Observation Station, Trimounts Outskirts
Anything new with the people on-site?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Nothing, officer.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: You shot word to your Director Clooney or whatever at Rhine, right? When exactly will he be here?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Director Clooney's in a... meeting right now.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Meeting? You're telling me he's still in a meeting? What kind of meeting's more important than his employees' lives?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Dammit!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Give me those binoculars.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Uh... okay.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: You don't think those Pioneers are gonna follow through, do you?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Let me tell you—they will.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Push them enough, and they'll do any fricking thing.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: So you mean our colleagues at the site could be in mortal danger?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Olivia Silence, Rhine Lab researcher, and Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals-partnered Medic Operator.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is my colleague from Rhodes Island, Mr. Greyy with the Engineering Department.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: H-Hello! I'm a Rhodes Island electrical engineer... but I'm still interning!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Rhodes Island? What kind of useless crap does that company do?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Forget it, save the explanation. One day passes in Trimounts and a barge of fresh company names unloads out of the sewers.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You're Rhine Lab, right? Got any pull in the office?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Pull? Ma'am, I'm not too sure what you mean...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Forget it, I knew you wouldn't be in charge.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You strike me as one of those... eggheads-swimming-in-books types, like the hostages they've got.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You guys and those guys might as well live on different planets.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I heard they were the Pioneers working at this site...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Pioneers.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: The name rings too nice for anything except billboards.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: And I know better than anyone what kind of people they are. Convicts, gamblers, Infected who can't stick the medical fees... Nothing to lose by the time they went out to the wastes.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Excuse me... could we try and talk to them?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You might have realized already, but Dr. Silence and I are both Infected. We're in a place to understand their situation.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Rhine Lab makes stupid cash, doesn't it? So does Rhodes Island or whatever?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You've got these, let's say 'well-intentioned,' companies paying your insurance premiums—that's the key thing.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: That's why you can shut up about understanding them.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Premiums? Which part exactly is...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: It's the way things work here in Columbia. A policy aimed at Infected.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ma'am, please trust us—Rhodes Island is a pharmaceutical corporation dedicated to addressing Infected issues.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Addressing issues? If I gave you a crossbow and told you to square away those kidnappers from here, would you do it?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: ...I couldn't.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm a doctor.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What about him?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Me? N-No, I don't think we've reached the point where we have to resort to violence...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Then it looks to me like you two can't help much at all.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: No sign of anyone coming, sir.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: They're playing it cool.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Say, you think the megacorps might not, uh... care if their hires die?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: What with those two being Infected and all.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't give me that.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Infected aren't subhuman or nothing. At the very least, we don't wanna treat each other like that.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Alright... said that on the Pioneer recruitment ads too.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Well, count our lucky stars the ads ain't all lies, then.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Would you kindly drop the communicator, Dr. Urbica?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: He said drop it! No funny business!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm... I'm putting it down. Please don't hurt us.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sir, she was sending messages!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Bring me those comms, Sam.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hmm. Only half-typed. Didn't get to send anything yet.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: These are our exact coordinates. You want them to send a drone in or something?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Let me give you another idea. Change this to an SOS, send it to your tutor, your manager... whoever.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Tell them—I'm waiting. And my patience is running out.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What exactly are you after?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Well that's wicked simple, doctor.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Me and my friends here, we all just wanna leave this place alive. That's all.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Director, finally, you're back! Can you spare a moment?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: You're... Ben. Ben from Structural.
Y-You remember my name?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Call me Ferdinand. Nine whole directors at Rhine Lab and all.
Sir... Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: My next meeting is in ten minutes.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I can spare you seven of those.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ahh... alright, thank you, thank you.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Sir, do you know where Control is right now?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I've got Structural's application for equipment purchases here. Control was supposed to give us an answer three days ago... but we haven't heard anything from her.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Structural's having to suspend a lot of its experiments right now...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Give me the form.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Alright, go procure.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Did... Did you just sign? The handbook says large-scale equipment purchases this expensive have to go through Control...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: How long have you been with Rhine Lab? Just a couple of months?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, sir... I reported in a month ago.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: See this site in front of you?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Isn't it monumental?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Fifteen years ago, this place was still wasteland, not even a single nomadic plate yet.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You wouldn't see Rhine Lab on a foldout of Trimounts back in those days.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Meet Parvis for tea, if get the chance.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You've got a lot to learn, Ben. And you won't find it in your handbook.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: A-Alright... Got it, sir.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Well look at that, I still have four minutes left.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Not often you call me when it's light out, Ferdinand.
Ho'olheyak.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Are you done with everything I asked?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Mmhm... at least three empty seats for Rhine Lab's directors' meeting today?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: No. That's not enough.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Oh? Which director's next?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Are you finally fed up with the old goat behind the chimeric organism experiments, or do you want the dreamer at the test site to never come back?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Word is Rhodes Island's people went to the site.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The experiment's almost complete. I don't want anyone getting in the way before it's done, understood?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You want me on site?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: No, no need for that.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: How cruel. Your assistant's one of the hostages, isn't she? I saw that Elena girl once. She's as pretty as she is hardworking.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I had a feeling you'd like her.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: She's with Energy. She can wrangle the Pioneers.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You keep an eye on developments in the city.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's unlikely Rhodes Island would only send two operators to the site. Don't forget, Saria's had a line to them all this time.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Oh? Your Defense Director again?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Saria's already stalled our experiments long enough... Both the Colonel and I are running short of patience.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Remember, they can't find anything this time.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This is the place, Doctor.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The last message we got from Saria was sent from this alley.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Looks normal to me.;We aren't exactly near Rhine Lab HQ.;Right by the commercial sector.

attributes.content: There's hundreds of these alleys in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Here to there is about a half-hour trip by car.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: That's the exact sector she was in.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: She was waiting for Muelsyse. They'd agreed to meet at a specific time.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Seems like Muelsyse got chased here.

attributes.content: If she wasn't being pursued, she'd never choose to set foot in this alley.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: No matter who it was, acting in the open streets would've obviously been too risky.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Silence told me about Muelsyse's ability.;Saria gave me a report on Muelsyse once.

attributes.content: Right... search complete.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 'Ability to manipulate water molecules'—would that be energy conversion-type or matter restructuring-type in terms of Originium Arts? No matter which principle it is, it's powerful at a glance.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: 'Water molecules'—no flaws visible to the naked eye?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Even more interesting. Experimental research folks and us mechanists are alike. Our powers of observation are usually razor-keen.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: If it fooled even Silence and Mayer, then it's not your ordinary Arts illusion.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Muelsyse wouldn't go down easy in a fight.;Muelsyse has strong self-preservation abilities.;Muelsyse is basically fight and flight in one.

attributes.content: There's a couple of scorch marks on the ground.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Not very wide-range... whoever did it, all signs point to some kind of technical equipment used to heat the air surrounding Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Considering her Arts are heavily dependent on water molecules, her opponent must've known her very well.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: They might be a Rhine insider too?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, watch out!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: That was close...;I was almost well-done there.

attributes.content: That was an energy weapon.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Shot from deep inside the alley. Enemy's only thirty meters from us, give or take.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: And getting closer.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Doctor, you'll want to stay behind me.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Defense system active.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Think we're in an ambush?;Can we hold out?

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I've never seen this model of power armor before. It's new.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Without testing, I can't tell you exactly how destructive any weapon hooked up to this could get.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: And by that, I mean we need a change of plans.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Escape system active—now get on my back!
attributes.name: Mechanist
